Deflect the Blast.name: Deflect the Blast
Deflect the Blast.flavor: You take shelter behind your trusty shield, protecting a nearby friend as well.
Deflect the Blast.trigger: A close or an area attack against AC or Reflex damages you
Deflect the Blast.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Deflect the Blast.effect: You take only half damage from the triggering attack. The damage is also halved against one adjacent ally who took damage from the triggering attack.

Ground the Foe.name: Ground the Foe
Ground the Foe.flavor: The power of your prayer hurls your foe to the ground.
Ground the Foe.onHit: 5d6 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target is knocked prone and immobilized (save ends).
Ground the Foe.aftereffect: The target is slowed and cannot fly (save ends both).
Ground the Foe.onMiss: Half damage. The target is slowed and is clumsy while flying (save ends both).

Challenging Smite.name: Challenging Smite
Challenging Smite.flavor: Your strike demands the attention of your chosen enemy, and that enemy ignores you at its peril.
Challenging Smite.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, your divine sanction and divine challenge deal 10 extra radiant damage.
